channel.title: Articles on Airspace
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Airspace

item.title: App installation
item.description: Since the communication of the application with the pilot is carried out through voice messages, it is necessary to have the voice synthesis engine of your device correctly configured by installing the voice synthesis files corresponding to English, Spanish or Portuguese, which are the languages ​​supported by the application.

item.title: Meteo wind
item.description: The airspace app uses gps readings to calculate the prevailing wind speed and direction during the flight. To ensure a reliable estimation it’s necessary a minimum number of samples in a wide range of directions of flight.

item.title: Polar curve
item.description: The polar curve of a glider is a graph that represents the sink rate of our glider as a function of air speed in neutral air conditions (without rises or falls).

item.title: Navigation
item.description: The application allows you to load task file with waypoints in order to make a route that passes through them. A waypoint is described by its name (xxx), latitude, longitude, radius, altitude, and altitude margin.
